title: Warp integrates AI with Warp AI (terminal chat)
why: Embed ChatGPT-based assistant directly into the terminal
impact: Slack‑like chat within terminal, AI‑powered command suggestions, error explanations, and execution
next: Expand terminal‑context awareness, port to more platforms, evolve into multi‑agent workflows

title: Stability AI releases Stable Diffusion 3
why: Multimodal Diffusion Transformer (MMDiT) architecture; first open-source DiT model
impact: Multi-subject prompts work reliably, text spelling vastly improved, transformers replace U-Net
next: SD 3.5 variants, community fine-tuning, DiT architecture becomes standard

title: Anthropic launches Claude Artifacts
why: No-code interactive app builder in conversational interface
impact: 500M+ artifacts created; democratizes app development without coding skills
next: Expand to more artifact types, collaborative editing, marketplace

title: Black Forest Labs launches Flux.1
why: 12B parameter flow transformer by original Stable Diffusion creators; $31M funding
impact: Matches DALL-E 3 in prompt fidelity, rivals Midjourney photorealism, fixes hands consistently
next: Flow matching becomes new standard, community adoption, commercial expansion

title: OpenAI releases o1 reasoning model
why: PhD-level reasoning with chain-of-thought processing
impact: 89th percentile competitive programming; breakthrough in complex problem-solving and mathematics
next: Expand reasoning capabilities, reduce latency, multimodal reasoning

title: Google launches NotebookLM Audio Overview
why: Transforms documents into engaging podcasts in 76 languages
impact: Automated content repurposing; learning becomes conversational and accessible
next: Personalized narration styles, interactive Q&A, video generation

title: Anthropic releases Claude computer use API
why: First AI to control computers visually like humans
impact: AI can navigate any UI, not just APIs; enables visual desktop automation
next: Expand to mobile devices, improve accuracy, multi-screen support

title: OpenAI launches Realtime API with native voice
why: Direct speech-to-speech processing without transcription bottleneck
impact: Native voice AI with emotion, interruption handling; true conversational interfaces
next: Expand language support, reduce latency, multimodal voice+vision

title: Cerebras launches inference API at 2,500+ tokens/sec
why: 19x faster than GPU inference; breakthrough in real-time AI responses
impact: Sub-second responses for complex queries; enables new interactive use cases
next: Expand model support, reduce costs, edge deployment

title: Nvidia acquires Gretel for synthetic data
why: $320M+ investment signals synthetic data as core AI infrastructure
impact: Solves data scarcity; enables privacy-preserving AI training at scale
next: Integration with Nvidia ecosystem, vertical-specific synthetic datasets

title: Anthropic releases Claude Code (research preview)
why: Terminal-based agentic coding assistant
impact: First major LLM CLI tool with codebase understanding, editing, git integration
next: Expand usage, public release beyond research preview

title: OpenAI releases Sora 2 with social features
why: Real-time video generation with cameos, remixing, social sharing
impact: Democratizes video production; creators build with AI-generated content
next: Longer videos, higher resolution, API access for developers

title: Model Context Protocol v1.0 ships
why: Unified way to stream context & tools to LLMs
impact: Bridges editors, browsers, servers with AI
next: Integration into NLWeb endpoints by default

title: Midjourney releases V7
why: 10x faster Draft Mode, automatic personalization from first use
impact: Instant style learning, perfect anatomy/hands/objects, professional quality at 2x speed
next: Video generation, API access, collaborative editing features

title: Google announces Agent‑2‑Agent (A2A) protocol
why: Standard for cross‑vendor agent communication
impact: Multi‑agent workflows become portable
next: Spec v1.0 due Q3; OSS SDKs incoming

title: OpenAI launches Codex CLI
why: Local, natural‑language terminal coding with approval modes
impact: Open‑source CLI agent enabling local AI‑powered coding workflows
next: Support GPT‑4.1/model expansion, community contributions

title: Microsoft unveils NLWeb at Build 2025
why: Open protocol for on‑site natural‑language search
impact: Decentralises AI UX; every site can host its own chatbot
next: Early pilots on TripAdvisor, Shopify by June

title: Google unveils Gemini Diffusion at I/O 2025
why: First diffusion language model achieving commercial-grade parity; parallel token generation
impact: 1,479 tokens/sec (5x faster); generates entire text blocks simultaneously; landmark moment ending autoregressive dominance
next: Challenge GPT/Claude architecture, hybrid models, high-throughput applications

title: Anthropic launches Claude 4 (Opus & Sonnet)
why: Improved coding & multitool reasoning
impact: Raises bar for developer‑oriented agents
next: Watch IDE plugins & long‑run agent demos

title: Google launches Veo 3 video generation
why: Native audio+video generation in 76 languages without separate pipeline
impact: True multimodal content creation; unified generation model
next: API access, longer videos, real-time generation

title: Google unveils Gemini CLI
why: Open‑source AI agent with Gemini 2.5 Pro in terminals
impact: Largest token context (1 M tokens), integrated MCP, media generation support
next: Preview expansions, community growth, deeper IDE/terminal sync

title: Meta releases Llama 4 Scout with 10M token context
why: 10 million token context window enables entire codebases in single request
impact: Context scale breakthrough; analyze full repositories, books, datasets
next: Expand to other Llama 4 variants, optimize memory efficiency
